job_tasks.phrase: integral leadership team role for the European Hub, helping our clients architect and engineer their digital journey while playing a key role in growing AND Digital's European business.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights the strategic and business-oriented nature of the role, focusing on client relationships and business growth.

job_tasks.phrase: involved in business development, architecting solutions, mentoring engineers and engineering teams, and staying current on the latest engineering concepts, frameworks and tooling.
job_tasks.justification: Mentions business development and aligning technical solutions with client needs, indicating a strong business understanding component.

job_tasks.phrase: Act as an engineering advisor for the portfolio of European clients - create artefacts, thought leadership, templates, case studies, AND Chats etc
job_tasks.justification: The role is positioned as an advisor, creating thought leadership and client-facing materials, which requires understanding business context.

job_tasks.phrase: Support business development activities for European clients by participating the the BD process alongside club execs and client partnerships, helping with understanding the clients, framing solutions and supporting the shaping and sizing of work
job_tasks.justification: Directly involves supporting business development and understanding client needs to frame and size work.

job_tasks.phrase: Provide engineering leadership, working closely with client stakeholders - CTO, CDO, CMO, CIO and Head of Engineering roles to developers and BA's
job_tasks.justification: Emphasizes working with high-level client stakeholders, requiring an understanding of their business objectives.

job_tasks.phrase: Advise and suggest engineering strategies to align with business vision across web, mobile, API, frameworks, cloud, platforms, data and increasingly genAI
job_tasks.justification: Focuses on aligning technical strategies with business vision, a key aspect of business understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: Apply a commercial mindset throughout an engagement - taking a total cost of ownership view on your proposed technology recommendations
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly mentions a commercial mindset and cost ownership, linking technology recommendations to business value.

job_tasks.phrase: increasingly genAI
job_tasks.justification: Indicates an involvement with generative AI technologies, which falls under the modeling umbrella.

job_tasks.phrase: Design and shape reference architecture with an emphasis on software, data and genAI
job_tasks.justification: Designing reference architectures, especially those involving genAI, implies an understanding and application of modeling principles.

job_tasks.phrase: architect and engineer their digital journey
job_tasks.justification: Implies a broad scope of engineering work, including architectural design and implementation of digital solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: experienced in leading large and complex software engineering transformations
job_tasks.justification: Indicates leadership in software engineering projects and transformations.

job_tasks.phrase: breadth of understanding of many aspects of software engineering within large enterprises - from ways of working, methods, tooling, metrics, engineers underpinned by deep software engineering expertise (but not expected to be a hands on developer at this stage of the career).
job_tasks.justification: Describes a comprehensive understanding of software engineering principles and practices, even if not hands-on coding.

job_tasks.phrase: Stay current on engineering - trends, innovations and points of view that makes us stand out from the crowd
job_tasks.justification: Requires staying updated on engineering advancements, which is a continuous part of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Advise and suggest engineering strategies to align with business vision across web, mobile, API, frameworks, cloud, platforms, data and increasingly genAI
job_tasks.justification: Covers advising on strategies for various software development domains like web, mobile, API, cloud, etc.

job_tasks.phrase: Prepare and deliver technology reviews and assessments of current software solutions, roadmaps and architecture
job_tasks.justification: Involves assessing and reviewing existing software solutions, roadmaps, and architectures.

job_tasks.phrase: Facilitate and deliver a software tooling and frameworks selection process appropriate for the client
job_tasks.justification: Covers the selection of software tools and frameworks, a critical part of the development lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: Propose software architectures to work alongside legacy and heritage applications to enable rapid deployment of customer benefiting functionality
job_tasks.justification: Focuses on architectural proposals for integrating with existing systems to deliver new functionality.

job_tasks.phrase: Design API integration strategies - enabling effective use of existing client technologies
job_tasks.justification: Specific task of designing API integration strategies.

job_tasks.phrase: Recommend and select software engineering components, tooling, platforms and frameworks, taking into account client existing and planned investments
job_tasks.justification: Involves recommending and selecting software engineering elements based on client needs and investments.

job_tasks.phrase: Work within discovery and activation stages and teams to to pull together and make decisions on the tech aspects of the engagement
job_tasks.justification: Highlights involvement in the technical decision-making process throughout project stages.

job_tasks.phrase: Get hands on with the work, beyond leading and directing - producing key artefacts, technology roadmaps, onsite reviews, blueprints, strategy documents, solution selection templates, facilitation and delivery of technology workshops
job_tasks.justification: Although not a hands-on developer, this phrase indicates contributing directly to deliverables like roadmaps, blueprints, and strategy documents, which are core to software development leadership.

job_tasks.phrase: increasingly genAI
job_tasks.justification: While not explicitly MLOps, the mention of genAI in a strategic and architectural context implies considerations for its deployment and integration, touching on operational aspects.

job_tasks.phrase: Design and shape reference architecture with an emphasis on software, data and genAI
job_tasks.justification: Designing architectures for genAI solutions would involve considering how they will be deployed and operated in production.

job_tasks.phrase: Propose software architectures to work alongside legacy and heritage applications to enable rapid deployment of customer benefiting functionality
job_tasks.justification: Enabling rapid deployment implies an understanding of deployment pipelines and operational considerations.

job_tasks.phrase: Recommend and select software engineering components, tooling, platforms and frameworks, taking into account client existing and planned investments
job_tasks.justification: The selection of platforms and frameworks can impact operational aspects like deployment and maintenance.

soft_skills.phrase: engineering advisor for the portfolio of European clients
Stay current on the latest engineering concepts, frameworks and tooling.
Stay current on engineering - trends, innovations and points of view
architect and engineer their digital journey
experienced in leading large and complex software engineering transformations
framing solutions and supporting the shaping and sizing of work
Prepare and deliver technology reviews and assessments
playing a key role in growing AND Digital's European business.
innovations and points of view that makes us stand out from the crowd
Apply a commercial mindset throughout an engagement
Get hands on with the work, beyond leading and directing

classification.rationale: This role is a senior engineering leadership position focused on advising clients and shaping digital transformation journeys. While it mentions 'genAI' and 'architecting solutions', it explicitly states the candidate is 'not expected to be a hands on developer'. The core responsibilities revolve around business development, client advisory, strategy, and general software engineering leadership rather than deep technical implementation of AI models. It lacks the specific focus on building, fine-tuning, or deploying generative AI applications required for the GenAI Engineer profile.
